caption.p: MTT-guided fractionation of T. bentzoë extract cytotoxicity against HepG2 cells. Cmpd: Compound. Cmpd 1= α and β- Punicalagin; compd 2 = Isoterchebulin; compd 3 = Terflavin A; cmpd 4 = 3,4,6-trigalloyl-β-D-glucopyranose; cmpd 5 = 2”- O-galloyl-orientin; cmpd 6 = 2”- O-galloyl-isoorientin.
